name: Show list of available payment gateways
scenarioId: get_payment_gateways:Show list of available payment gateways
methodName: Show list of available payment gateways

testSteps.description: Given that the user is on the payment page
When the system loads the payment page
Then the system should display a list of payment gateways including PSE, Bancolombia Button, Pay U, PayPal, Stripe, Wompi

userStory.narrative:
As a user, I want to be able to select my preferred payment gateway when making my purchase,
  to ensure that I use my preferred payment method.

title: Show list of available payment gateways
